concept.title: Geo-Segmentation Data
concept.shortdesc: Geo-Segmentation data is recorded based on the first hit of the visit, and does not change for a single visit regardless of the device used.

conbody.p: If a customer browses your site from his or her home computer, and then from a mobile device within 30 minutes, the Geo-Segmentation data is not changed. If you are using VISTA to populate an eVar with Geo-Segmentation data, it is based on the IP address in each hit. This could result in multiple Geo-Segmentation data values if the IP address changes for the same visit.
